A '''charred baked potato brick slab''' is a [[charred baked potato brick]] variant of a [[slab]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
{{breaking row|Charred Baked Potato Brick Slab|Hoe|Wood|horizontal=1|hidecopper=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Charred baked potato brick slabs generate naturally in [[hash well]]s, [[colosseum]]s, and [[ruined portatol]]s, as well as blacksmith houses in [[potato village]]s.
